Package br.com.caelum.vraptor

Interface Summary
ComponentRegistry Represents the registry of all components allowing them to be registered for injection.
Converter<T> Converts a string value to an object.
Result A resource requisition result.
Validator A validator interface for vraptor3.
Based on hamcrest, it allows you to assert for specific situations.
View  
 

Class Summary
IteratorToEnumerationAdapter<T> An enumeration backed by an itearator.
VRaptor VRaptor entry point.
Provider configuration is supported through init parameter.
 

Exception Summary
InterceptionException  
VRaptorException  
 

Annotation Types Summary
Consumes  
Convert  
Delete  
Get Notifies Vraptor that the annotated method supports the http GET requisitions.
Head  
Intercepts Notifies vraptor to use this interceptor in the interceptor stack.
Interceptors annotated are run in any order, therefore if the sequence is important to your project, use an annotated InterceptorSequence.
Path Sets a custom path to allow web requisitions to access this resource.
To be used together with web methods annotations as Get, Post and so on.
Post Supports the POST http method.
Put Supports the PUT http method.
Resource Resources are entry points for requests; i.e, requests are handled by VRaptor Resources.
Trace
